subject: Science
title: Titan: A Moon with Weather
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Titan: A Moon with Weather.

hook.text: Saturn's moon Titan has something no other moon does: a thick atmosphere.

buildup.text: Its atmosphere is denser than Earth's â€” mostly nitrogen, like ours.

discovery.text: Titan has rain, rivers, and lakes â€” but they're made of liquid methane.

twist.text: The Huygens probe landed there in 2005 and sent back photos of a wet shoreline.

climax.text: Titan is the only other place in the solar system with stable surface liquids.

punchline.text: Titan has lakes, rain, and rivers â€” just not made of water.

quiz.question: What fills Titan's lakes and rivers?
